description: Architectural and Engineering Services for physical security upgrades to a Canadian embassy in Central Africa
full_summary:
=====================================

### Invitation to Qualify
#### Architectural and Engineering Services for Physical Security Upgrades

The Department of Foreign Affairs, Trade and Development (DFATD) invites interested qualified consultants to participate in an Invitation to Qualify (ITQ) for the provision of Architectural and Engineering (A&E) services for physical security upgrades to a Canadian embassy in Central Africa.

#### Tender Details
| **Category** | **Description**|
| --- | --- |
| **Reference Number** | cb-480-16612260 |
| **Amendment Number** | 6 |
| **Solicitation Number** | 24-252461 |
| **Publication Date** | 30 Nov 2023 |
| **Tender Closing Date** | 19 Jan 2024, 14:00:00 |
| **Procurement Method** | Competitive - Open Bidding |
| **Trade Agreements** | Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA), Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, and Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA) |

#### Brief Overview
The successful consultant will be responsible for engaging or partnering with a local architecture firm (Sub-Consultant) to provide A&E services for physical security upgrades at a Canadian embassy in Central Africa. The project scope includes all necessary design and planning to enhance physical security at the embassy.

#### Contact Information
For any inquiries or clarifications, please contact:

* Tanya Di Virgilio
* Email: realproperty-contracts@international.gc.ca
* Phone: (343) 548-8491

#### Attachments
Tender notices, addenda, and quotes can be accessed at the following URLs:

* English: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/25937/24-252461---addendum-2.pdf, https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/25937/24-252461---qa-2.pdf, https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/25937/24-252461---qa-1.pdf, https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/25937/24-252461---addendum-1---en.pdf
